creator: abatko@cs.mcgill.ca
text:
Please remove the extra spaces (or tabs) from the
front of the #if line, so that the block lines up nicely.

Original text:
The structure of this conditional construct is:

        <!--#if expr="test_condition" -->
    <!--#elif expr="test_condition" -->
    <!--#else -->
    <!--#endif -->

Hmmm... Me thinks your browser is a little wacky.  This looks fine to me.

By the way, if you are interested in helping out in a more efficient way,
you might like to visit the documentation project:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs-project/
creator: slive@apache.org
jwoolley@apache.org
text: nope, it really did have extra whitespace.  :)  fix committed.  thanks!

Ahh, sorry, I was looking at an almost identical example in mod_include.
I should read more carefully.
creator: slive@apache.org
